liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

fightCommand.label: Start bet command
fightCommand.tooltip: Name of the command to start a bet

viewCommand.label: View bet command
viewCommand.tooltip: Name of the command to lock a bet

deleteCommand.label: Delete bet command
deleteCommand.tooltip: Name of the command to lock a bet

lockCommand.label: Lock bet command
lockCommand.tooltip: Name of the command to lock a bet

fightPermission.label: Start bet permission level
fightPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

lockPermission.label: Lock bet permission level
lockPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

betPermission.label: Bet permission level
betPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

winPermission.label: Declare winner permission level
winPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

cancelPermission.label: Cancel Bet permission level
cancelPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

currencyCommand.label: Currency command
currencyCommand.tooltip: Name of the command to manipulate Stream Brackets currency, also determines the currency name

startCurrency.label: Starting currency
startCurrency.tooltip: Currency each viewer starts with when entering the currency command for the first time

currencyPermission.label: General currency permission level
currencyPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

currencyAddPermission.label: Currency add permission level
currencyAddPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

currencyRemovePermission.label: Currency remove permission level
currencyRemovePermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

MyFile.label: Currency save file
MyFile.tooltip: File where all the currency is saved
